long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
الوضع المظلم أو الداكن لموقع خمسات دوت كوم

Dark mode for Khamsat.com!
Dark mode for those long nights working on Khamsat!

This extension changes the style of Khamsat to a dark theme that is easier on the eyes and looks cooler :)

The dark mode and page color can be toggled on and off by disabling/enabling the extension.
